content: I’ve literally tried everything on the forum, but christ1 gave me the only and successful answer, it was found like magic. Thank you so much christ1. I still don’t see it from the pull-down menu though.
creator: heecheul.choi

content:
At the top right of the Thunderbird window, click the menu button ≡ > Settings

Type 'config editor' into the search field (without the quotes).
creator: christ1

content:
Same place it has been for a long time. Also the same place the support article on the config editor says it is.

See https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/config-editor
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Are you running the filter on a folder other than the Inbox? Filters only run automatically on the Inbox, but can be run manually on any folder.
creator: sfhowes

content: Locking this duplicate - There is an answer at https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1424128
